contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The order of the Superior Court entered on December 29, 1987, at No. 1598 Philadelphia 1987, 375 Pa.Super. 612, 541 A.2d 25, is reversed. The matter is remanded to the Superi- or Court with instructions that it vacate the order since the matter was disposed of by their action taken in No. 1597 Philadelphia 1987.
